definition: four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The fine structure parameters were calculated using a least-squares fitting procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用最小二乘法拟合技术严格地计算了精细结构参数。

sentences.english: Can I check in here for the Air France flight to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 我乘法航班机飞往巴黎，能在这里检票吗？

sentences.english: Non-Linear Least Squares were used to estimate the exponential time model.
sentences.chinese: 非线性最小二乘法用于估算指数时间模型。

sentences.english: Plate_bending element_free method, which is based on the moving least squares (MLS) interpolants, is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 针对基于滑动最小二乘法的板弯曲无单元法进行研究。

sentences.english: The least square method for linear equations over non-archimedean local fields is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了非阿基米德局部域上的最小二乘法。

sentences.english: A times table isn't the most common need for a method.
sentences.chinese: 使用方法时，人们最希望获得的结果并非总是乘法表。

sentences.english: Compared with the traditional serial multiplier, it can obtain twice speed-up.
sentences.chinese: 与传统的移位乘法器相比，它将乘法器速度提高一倍。

sentences.english: Compared with the traditional serial multiplier, it can obtain twice speed-up.
sentences.chinese: 与传统的移位乘法器相比，它将乘法器速度提高一倍。

sentences.english: In addition, the left precuneus and the right fusiform were activated in multiplication calculation.
sentences.chinese: 乘法计算还见左侧楔前叶和右侧梭状回激活。

sentences.english: You would expect multiplication, for example, to have a higher precedence than addition.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您期望乘法的优先级比加法高。

sentences.english: The teacher hammered away at the multiplication tables.
The Principle of the least squares method is applied to the static calibration of strain guage balances.
sentences.chinese: 本文将最小二乘法原理应用于应变式天平的静校。

sentences.english: The principle of simplified four-quadrant multiplier was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了简化的四象限乘法器的原理。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 对成年人的商议者的侮辱导致有故障的水龙头的乘法。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multipmultiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 对成年人的商议者的侮辱导致有故障的水龙头的乘法。

sentences.english: A novel 43-bit floating-point pipelined multiplier IP chip-core is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种浮点流水线乘法器IP芯核。

definition: four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
to square a number/to calculate the square
the factorial of a number, e.g. 5! = 5.4.3.2.1 = 120
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
